deity_markdown: [Abadar](/Deities.aspx?ID=277), [Aesocar](/Deities.aspx?ID=403), [Alglenweis](/Deities.aspx?ID=605), [Apsu](/Deities.aspx?ID=330), [Bharnarol](/Deities.aspx?ID=467), [Bolka](/Deities.aspx?ID=445), [Brigh](/Deities.aspx?ID=333), [Demon Bringers](/Deities.aspx?ID=230), [Dwarven Pantheon](/Deities.aspx?ID=196), [Inna](/Deities.aspx?ID=539), [Isis](/Deities.aspx?ID=517), [Liisglan](/Deities.aspx?ID=540), [Mammon](/Deities.aspx?ID=399), [Nocticula](/Deities.aspx?ID=355), [Radiant Prism](/Deities.aspx?ID=380), [Shelyn](/Deities.aspx?ID=293), [Stone's Blood](/Deities.aspx?ID=382), [Sun Wukong](/Deities.aspx?ID=316), [The Endless Road](/Deities.aspx?ID=246), [The Laborer's Bastion](/Deities.aspx?ID=253), [Torag](/Deities.aspx?ID=294), [Varg](/Deities.aspx?ID=561), [Wheels Of Innovation](/Deities.aspx?ID=385), [Wulgren](/Deities.aspx?ID=562), [Zogmugot](/Deities.aspx?ID=508)
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">
[Creation](/Spells.aspx?ID=1477)
<actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 322 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Abadar](/Deities.aspx?ID=277), [Aesocar](/Deities.aspx?ID=403), [Alglenweis](/Deities.aspx?ID=605), [Apsu](/Deities.aspx?ID=330), [Bharnarol](/Deities.aspx?ID=467), [Bolka](/Deities.aspx?ID=445), [Brigh](/Deities.aspx?ID=333), [Demon Bringers](/Deities.aspx?ID=230), [Dwarven Pantheon](/Deities.aspx?ID=196), [Inna](/Deities.aspx?ID=539), [Isis](/Deities.aspx?ID=517), [Liisglan](/Deities.aspx?ID=540), [Mammon](/Deities.aspx?ID=399), [Nocticula](/Deities.aspx?ID=355), [Radiant Prism](/Deities.aspx?ID=380), [Shelyn](/Deities.aspx?ID=293), [Stone's Blood](/Deities.aspx?ID=382), [Sun Wukong](/Deities.aspx?ID=316), [The Endless Road](/Deities.aspx?ID=246), [The Laborer's Bastion](/Deities.aspx?ID=253), [Torag](/Deities.aspx?ID=294), [Varg](/Deities.aspx?ID=561), [Wheels Of Innovation](/Deities.aspx?ID=385), [Wulgren](/Deities.aspx?ID=562), [Zogmugot](/Deities.aspx?ID=508)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** 1 minute

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 0 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

You conjure a temporary object from magical energy. It must consist of earthen or plant-derived matter (such as wood, paper, brick, or stone) and be 5 cubic feet or smaller. It can't rely on intricate artistry or complex moving parts, never fulfills a cost or the like, and can't be made of [precious](/Traits.aspx?ID=131) materials or materials with a rarity of [uncommon](/Traits.aspx?ID=159) or higher. It is obviously temporarily conjured, and thus can't be sold or passed off as a genuine item. The spell gains the appropriate trait for the item created, typically [earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55), [plant](/Traits.aspx?ID=125), or [wood](/Traits.aspx?ID=508).

---
**Heightened (5th)** The item is metal and can include common minerals, like feldspar or quartz. The spell gains the [metal](/Traits.aspx?ID=505) trait if used to create a metal object.
name: Creation

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 322 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Abadar](/Deities.aspx?ID=277), [Aesocar](/Deities.aspx?ID=403), [Alglenweis](/Deities.aspx?ID=605), [Apsu](/Deities.aspx?ID=330), [Bharnarol](/Deities.aspx?ID=467), [Bolka](/Deities.aspx?ID=445), [Brigh](/Deities.aspx?ID=333), [Demon Bringers](/Deities.aspx?ID=230), [Dwarven Pantheon](/Deities.aspx?ID=196), [Inna](/Deities.aspx?ID=539), [Isis](/Deities.aspx?ID=517), [Liisglan](/Deities.aspx?ID=540), [Mammon](/Deities.aspx?ID=399), [Nocticula](/Deities.aspx?ID=355), [Radiant Prism](/Deities.aspx?ID=380), [Shelyn](/Deities.aspx?ID=293), [Stone's Blood](/Deities.aspx?ID=382), [Sun Wukong](/Deities.aspx?ID=316), [The Endless Road](/Deities.aspx?ID=246), [The Laborer's Bastion](/Deities.aspx?ID=253), [Torag](/Deities.aspx?ID=294), [Varg](/Deities.aspx?ID=561), [Wheels Of Innovation](/Deities.aspx?ID=385), [Wulgren](/Deities.aspx?ID=562), [Zogmugot](/Deities.aspx?ID=508)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** 1 minute

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 0 feet

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Make a temporary object.
</summary>
text: Creation Source Player Core pg. 322 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Deities Abadar, Aesocar, Alglenweis, Apsu, Bharnarol, Bolka, Brigh, Demon Bringers, Dwarven Pantheon, Inna, Isis, Liisglan, Mammon, Nocticula, Radiant Prism, Shelyn, Stone's Blood, Sun Wukong, The Endless Road, The Laborer's Bastion, Torag, Varg, Wheels Of Innovation, Wulgren, Zogmugot Cast 1 minute Range 0 feet Duration 1 hour --- You conjure a temporary object from magical energy. It must consist of earthen or plant-derived matter (such as wood, paper, brick, or stone) and be 5 cubic feet or smaller. It can't rely on intricate artistry or complex moving parts, never fulfills a cost or the like, and can't be made of precious materials or materials with a rarity of uncommon or higher. It is obviously temporarily conjured, and thus can't be sold or passed off as a genuine item. The spell gains the appropriate trait for the item created, typically earth, plant, or wood. --- Heightened (5th) The item is metal and can include common minerals, like feldspar or quartz. The spell gains the metal trait if used to create a metal object.
